All Classes

Class Description
ActionCard
ActionCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of an action card in the Thats Life! game.
BlueCard
BlueCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a blue card in the Thats Life! game.
Board
Board is the class that contains the attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a board in the Thats Life! game.
BoardConfig
BoardConfig is an interface that provides the defined and fixed configuration of the board together with its respective spaces.
Card
Card is the general class for all the card types in the Thats Life! game.
CareerCard
CareerCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a career card in the Thats Life! game.
Deck
Deck handles the card decks of That's Life.
HouseCard
HouseCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a house card in the Thats Life! game.
Player
Player is the class that contains the attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a player in the Thats Life! game.
PlayerCard
PlayerCard is an abstract class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior o a card that can be owned by a player in the Thats Life! game.
SalaryCard
SalaryCard is the class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a salary card in the Thats Life! game.
Space
Space is the class that contains the attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a space in the Thats Life! game.
Status
Status holds all the additional information of a player.
ThatsLife
ThatsLife is the master (main) class for the model aspect of the That's Life! game.
ValueCard
ValueCard is an abstract class that contains the needed attributes and methods to implement the behavior of a card that contains an amount and action value for cash manipulation purposes in the Thats Life! game.
Wheel
Wheel handles the random number generation aspect of That's Life.
